Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Rosetta? Why are you here all alone... Where's our dear lab rat?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'If you mean the commandant—currently testing the command system.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Oh boy, that's trouble... Forget it, I'll go look...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Wait! What do you mean by trouble?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You wouldn't understand anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Then please explain in a way that I can. Aren't you an expert at that?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Sigh, fine... I found code for an early prototype of a M.I.N.D. system in the system shell.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "After all, most of the systems developed by the ARU at this time were like this—for example, the mech narwhal. So, I didn't pay much attention to it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But recently, when I checked the noise mixed in the AI voice used in "Virtual Horizon", I discovered that it was actually an encrypted waveform file.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'A waveform file...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Like electromagnetic waves, seismic waves, or most commonly—sound.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Can you convert the waveform into sound and play it for me?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Asimov sends the translated waveform audio to Rosetta.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Sure, of course. But I've already tried that. It doesn't appear to have any meaning...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Lonely. World. Loop. Eternal. Dream. 【kuroname】... My dream.. dream... dream...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "What's wrong?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's the meaning of the audio—Derek's voice... It contains some simple words, but it mentions the commandant...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's not a message that a simple AI guide can convey.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Looks like my hunch was right... Take me to the commandant!', 4: '2'}
